scripts.build: docker build . -t treehub/www:`git rev-parse HEAD` && docker build . -t treehub/www:latest
scripts.push: docker push treehub/www:`git rev-parse HEAD` && docker push treehub/www:latest
scripts.deploy: kubectl -n treehub set image deployment/www www=treehub/www:`git rev-parse HEAD`
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run push && npm run deploy
